name: Sushi Roll Sampler
description: An assortment of classic sushi rolls including California Roll, Spicy Tuna Roll, and Avocado Cucumber Roll.

name: Sashimi Platter
description: Fresh slices of raw fish including salmon, tuna, and yellowtail, served with wasabi and soy sauce.

name: Dragon Roll
description: Eel, cucumber, and avocado roll topped with slices of eel and a sweet unagi sauce.

name: Rainbow Roll
description: Colorful sushi roll with a variety of fish on top, creating a visually stunning and delicious combination.

name: Spicy Tuna Roll
description: Tuna and spicy mayo rolled in rice and seaweed, a favorite for those who enjoy a kick of heat.

name: Salmon Nigiri
description: Fresh salmon slices on compact beds of sushi rice, a simple and delightful choice.

name: Eel Sushi
description: Grilled eel atop seasoned rice, glazed with a luscious eel sauce, a sushi delicacy.

name: Vegetable Maki
description: Assorted vegetables rolled in rice and seaweed, a perfect choice for vegetarians.
